kok_IN {
    LocaleString { "kok_IN" }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "##,##,##0.###;-##,##,##0.###",
            "\u00A4##,##,##0.00;-\u00A4##,##,##0.00",
            "##,##,##0%",
    }
    ShortCountry { "IND" }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "h:mm:ss a z",
                    "h:mm:ss a z",
                    "h:mm:ss a",
                    "h:mm a",
                    "EEEE d MMMM yyyy",
                    "d MMMM yyyy",
                    "dd-MM-yyyy",
                    "d-M-yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
        }
    }
}
